about_the_game:
Sex Desert: Mad Lust opens up the universe of Carnality INC. - a futuristic corporation that provides its clients with a thrill of living out their wildest fantasies set up in the company’s amusement park, filled with ultra-realistic decorations and intelligent android actors.

The protagonist is a client taking off on an adventure set up in a dystopian post-apocalyptic desert split up between the Dictator of religious fanatics and the Rebels - a group of people who don’t go along with a dictatorship.

Since you’re the only one who knows every major twist and occurrence of the story in advance, you declare yourself a Prophet and try to establish your own religious authority, opposing the Dictator himself.

Thanks to being the customer of that madness - you can shape events however you like! Whose side will you take, would you betray them, who’ll be your fellow companions, and who will try to hunt you down? You decide!

Features:
  • Unique and thrilling setting - an adult amusement park with androids allows its clients to get fully immersed in an unforgettable adventure.
  • Diverse and branching plot - you shape the story however you like!
  • Remarkable characters - from psychopaths hiding behind the cutie mask to the lady with an iron grip or strong and sadistic Dictator servants.
  • Part of a bigger universe - more stories from the Carnality INC amusement park is coming!
  • High-quality visuals and animation - we’ve put an immense amount of work into designing and animating various locations, characters and adult scenes.
  • Hot 18+ content - one of the main features of the Carnality INC androids is that they’re open and fit to any kind of interaction - prepare yourself for numerous adult scenes.
  • Gameplay mechanics - shape the protagonist’s personality with your actions, improve and balance your stats, build up a reputation for your character, spread your religion across the wasteland and complete various quests!

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains mature content, including depiction of explicit sexual acts, non-consensual sex, sexual violence, and nudity. All characters are 18 years or older.
